name: Roof Run
description:
Roof Run is an open-source C++ game made in Unreal Engine 4.

The game consists of 2 levels, a tutorial level and a challenging level to test out the player's skills.

In this game, you will be jumping and dashing around from building to building trying to not fall down or get caught by the robo-guards!

The controls are simple:

Movement  - W A S D

Jump - Space

Left Shift - Dash (you can dash in any direction by using W A S D)

You can download the source files right here: https://github.com/Sntfon100/OpenSource_CPP_ParkourGame

Enjoy!
